publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1973 Ross Finnie: The Draft Agricultural Holdings (Right to Buy Modifications) (Scotland) Regulations 2004—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Agricultural Holdings (Right to Buy Modifications) (Scotland) Regulations 2004 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S2M-1973 Ross Finnie: The Draft Agricultural Holdings (Right to Buy Modifications) (Scotland) Regulations 2004—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Agricultural Holdings (Right to Buy Modifications) (Scotland) Regulations 2004 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
